title: Wireless MAC Standards Architect
summary: As a Senior Wireless MAC Standards Architect, you will be responsible for driving and designing the next generation of media access control layer protocols for wireless technologies.
description: Participate, contribute novel MAC protocols and algorithms, influence, and generate consensus around company strategic interests in wireless standards organizations. Simulate MAC system level performance using simulation tools, such as ns3, OpNet, C/C++, or Python, to validate MAC system performance of internal and external technical contributions...
key_qualifications: Proven track record of participation and technical leadership in wireless standardization organization, such as IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.15, Bluetooth, UWB or similar technologies. Strong familiarity with MAC protocols and algorithms of wireless standards, such as IEEE 802.11, IEEE 802.15, Bluetooth SIG, or similar technologies...
education_experience: BS degree in technical discipline with minimum 3 years of relevant experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
